TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpApplicationStateWrapper extends System.Web.HttpApplicationStateBase

Docs.summary: Encapsulates the HTTP intrinsic object that enables information to be shared across multiple requests and sessions within an ASP.NET application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationStateWrapper> class derives from the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationStateBase> class and serves as a wrapper for the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState> class. This class exposes the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState> class while also exposing the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationStateBase> type. The <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationStateBase> class enables you to replace the original implementation of the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState> class in your application with a custom implementation, such as when you perform unit testing outside the ASP.NET pipeline.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property StaticObjects As HttpStaticObjectsCollectionBase

Docs.summary: Gets all objects that are declared by an element where the scope is set to "Application" in the ASP.NET application.
Docs.value: A collection of objects in the application.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Application objects are defined in the Global.asax file inside an element that has syntax like the following:
`<object runat="server" scope="Application">Object information</object>`
